mapper.select: SELECT H.WORK_SEQ AS workSeq , H.WORK_TYPE AS workType , (CASE WHEN WORK_TYPE == 'AT' THEN (SELECT ACT_NAME FROM SMPS_COMM_ACT WHERE ACT_ID = H.WORK_ID LIMIT 1) || '(동작)' WHEN WORK_TYPE == 'SR' THEN (SELECT SNR_NAME FROM SMPS_COMM_SNR WHERE SNR_ID = H.WORK_ID LIMIT 1) || '(시나리오)' END) AS workName , H.WORK_DATETIME AS workDatetime , COUNT(H.WORK_SEQ) AS rstCount , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SMPS_WORK_RST WHERE WORK_SEQ = H.WORK_SEQ AND RST_TYPE='SUCCESS') AS successCount , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SMPS_WORK_RST WHERE WORK_SEQ = H.WORK_SEQ AND RST_TYPE='FAIL') AS failCount FROM SMPS_WORK_HST AS H LEFT OUTER JOIN SMPS_WORK_RST R ON H.WORK_SEQ = R.WORK_SEQ GROUP BY H.WORK_SEQ ORDER BY H.WORK_SEQ DESC

SELECT WORK_SEQ AS workSeq , RST_SEQ AS rstSeq , RST_NAME AS rstName , RST_TYPE AS rstType , START_DATETIME AS startDatetime , END_DATETIME AS endDatetime , RES_TIME AS resTime , RST_CONT AS rstContent FROM SMPS_WORK_RST WHERE WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq} ORDER BY START_DATETIME ASC

SELECT STRFTIME('%S', RESULT_TIME) AS RESULT_TIME , SUM(COUNT_START_REQUEST) AS COUNT_START_REQUEST , SUM(COUNT_END_REQUEST) AS COUNT_END_REQUEST FROM (SELECT STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RESULT_TIME) AS RESULT_TIME , COUNT(STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RESULT_TIME)) AS COUNT_START_REQUEST , 0 AS COUNT_END_REQUEST FROM (SELECT STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', START_DATETIME, '-0.' || SUBSTR(T.START_TIME, -3, 3) || ' seconds') AS RESULT_TIME FROM SMPS_WORK_RST AS R, (SELECT SUBSTR(START_DATETIME, -3, 3) AS START_TIME FROM SMPS_WORK_RST WHERE WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq} ORDER BY START_DATETIME ASC LIMIT 1) AS T WHERE R.WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq}) T GROUP BY STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RESULT_TIME) UNION SELECT STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RESULT_TIME) AS RESULT_TIME , 0 AS COUNT_START_REQUEST , COUNT(STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RESULT_TIME)) AS COUNT_END_REQUEST FROM (SELECT STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', END_DATETIME, '-0.' || SUBSTR(T.START_TIME, -3, 3) || ' seconds') AS RESULT_TIME FROM SMPS_WORK_RST AS R, (SELECT SUBSTR(START_DATETIME, -3, 3) AS START_TIME FROM SMPS_WORK_RST WHERE WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq} ORDER BY START_DATETIME ASC LIMIT 1) AS T WHERE R.WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq}) T GROUP BY STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RESULT_TIME)) T GROUP BY RESULT_TIME

SELECT 'WK' || SUBSTR('0000000', 1, 7 - length(T.SEQ || '')) || T.SEQ AS workSeq FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) == 0 THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT CAST(SUBSTR(WORK_SEQ, 3, 7) AS INTEGER) + 1 FROM SMPS_WORK_HST ORDER BY WORK_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) END) AS SEQ FROM SMPS_WORK_HST) AS T
